testsuite.test:
autofocus
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Was the input field focused right away?

placeholder
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Do you see placeholder text in the input field?

readonly
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the input field NOT editable?

readonly set to false but still readonly
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the input field NOT editable?

disabled let user verify
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the input field disabled?

disabled prevent firing events
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'! 2) Click the input element.
Expected behaviour: Did clicking the input field NOT show 'FAIL'?

required validate empty field doesn t submit
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'! 2) Type nothing in the input field! 3) Click the submit button!
Expected behaviour: Did the form NOT submit?

required validate non empty field does submit
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'! 2) Type something in the input field! 3) Click the submit button!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

pattern simple positive test
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

pattern match
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

pattern user input should match
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO' 2) Type '123'! 3) Click the submit button!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

pattern user input should NOT match
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO' 2) Type 'abc'! 3) Click the submit button!
Expected behaviour: Was the form NOT submittable?
